metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42299 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in OpenImageIO oiio v.2.4.12.0 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service via the read_subimage_data function.

criterions.comment: openimageio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
